verses.verse: Now <WG1161> concerning <WG4012> the collection <WG3048> for <WG1519> the saints, <WG40> as <WG5618> I commanded <WG1299> the assemblies <WG1577> of Galatia, <WG1053> you <WG5210> do <WG4160> <WG2532> likewise. <WG3779>

On <WG2596> the first <WG1520> day of the week, <WG4521> let each one <WG1538> of you <WG5216> save, <WG5087> as <WG3844> he <WG1438> <WG2343> may <WG5100> <WG99999> prosper, <WG2137> that <WG2443> no <WG3361> collections <WG3048> be <WG1096> made when <WG5119> <WG3752> I come. <WG2064>

<WG1161> When <WG3752> I arrive, <WG3854> I will send <WG3992> whoever <WG3739> <WG1437> you approve <WG1381> with <WG1223> letters <WG1992> to carry <WG667> your <WG5216> gracious gift <WG5485> to <WG1519> Jerusalem. <WG2419>
<WG1161> If <WG1437> it is <WG5600> appropriate <WG514> for me to go <WG4198> also, <WG2504> they will go <WG4198> with <WG4862> me. <WG1698>
But <WG1161> I will come <WG2064> to <WG4314> you <WG5209> when <WG3752> I have passed through <WG1330> Macedonia, <WG3109> for <WG1063> I am passing through <WG1330> Macedonia. <WG3109>

But <WG1161> with <WG4314> you <WG2443> it may <WG2228> be that <WG5177> I will stay, <WG3887> or even <WG2532> winter, <WG3914> that <WG2443> you <WG5209> may send <WG4311> me <WG3165> on my journey <WG4311> wherever <WG3757> <WG1437> I go. <WG4198>

For <WG1063> I do <WG2309> not <WG3756> wish to see <WG1492> you <WG5209> now <WG737> in <WG1722> passing, <WG3938> but I <WG5100> hope <WG1679> to stay <WG1961> <WG99999> a while <WG5550> with <WG4314> you, <WG5209> if <WG1437> the Lord <WG2962> permits. <WG2010>
But <WG1161> I will stay <WG1961> at <WG1722> Ephesus <WG2181> until <WG2193> Pentecost, <WG4005>
for <WG1063> a great <WG3173> and <WG2532> effective <WG1756> door <WG2374> has opened to <WG455> me, <WG3427> and <WG2532> there are many <WG4183> adversaries. <WG480>

Now <WG1161> if <WG1437> Timothy <WG5095> comes, <WG2064> see <WG991> that <WG2443> he is <WG1096> with <WG4314> you <WG5209> without fear, <WG870> for <WG1063> he does <WG2038> the work <WG2041> of the Lord, <WG2962> as <WG5613> I <WG1473> also do. <WG2532>

Therefore <WG3767> let <WG1848> no <WG3361> one <WG5100> despise <WG1848> him. <WG846> But <WG1161> set <WG4311> him <WG846> forward <WG4311> on his journey in <WG1722> peace, <WG1515> that <WG2443> he may come <WG2064> to <WG4314> me; <WG3165> for <WG1551> I expect <WG1551> him <WG846> with <WG3326> the brothers. <WG80>

Now <WG1161> concerning <WG4012> Apollos, <WG625> the brother, <WG80> I <WG3870> strongly <WG4183> urged <WG3870> him <WG846> to <WG2443> come <WG2064> to <WG2443> you <WG5209> with <WG3326> the brothers; <WG80> and <WG2532> it was <WG2258> not <WG3756> at all <WG3843> his desire <WG2307> to <WG2443> come <WG2064> now; <WG3568> but <WG1161> he will come <WG2064> when <WG3752> he has an opportunity. <WG2119>
Watch! <WG1127> Stand firm <WG4739> in <WG1722> the faith! <WG4102> Be courageous! <WG407> Be strong! <WG2901>
Let <WG1096> all <WG3956> that you <WG5216> do <WG3956> be done <WG1096> in <WG1722> love. <WG26>

Now I beg <WG3870> you, <WG5209> brothers <WG80> (you <WG5209> know <WG1492> the house <WG3614> of Stephanas, <WG4734> that <WG3754> it is <WG2076> the first fruits of Achaia, <WG882> and <WG2532> that they have set <WG5021> themselves <WG1438> to <WG1519> serve <WG1248> the saints <WG40>),
that <WG2443> you <WG5210> also <WG2532> be in subjection <WG5293> to such, <WG5108> and <WG2532> to everyone <WG3956> who <WG3588> helps <WG4903> in the work and <WG2532> labors. <WG2872>

I rejoice <WG5463> at the coming <WG3952> of Stephanas, <WG4734> <WG2532> Fortunatus, <WG5415> and <WG2532> Achaicus; <WG883> for that <WG3754> which <WG3588> was lacking <WG5303> on <WG1909> your part, <WG5216> they <WG3778> supplied. <WG378>
For <WG1063> they refreshed <WG373> my <WG1699> spirit <WG4151> and <WG2532> yours. <WG5216> Therefore <WG3767> acknowledge <WG1921> those who <WG3588> are like that. <WG3588>

The assemblies <WG1577> of Asia <WG773> greet <WG782> you. <WG5209> Aquila <WG207> and <WG2532> Priscilla <WG4252> greet <WG782> you <WG5209> much <WG4183> in <WG1722> the Lord, <WG2962> together with <WG4862> the assembly <WG1577> that is in <WG2596> their <WG846> house. <WG3624>
All <WG3956> the brothers <WG80> greet <WG782> you. <WG5209> Greet <WG782> one another <WG240> with <WG1722> a holy <WG40> kiss. <WG5370>
This greeting <WG783> is by <WG3972> me, <WG3972> Paul, with my own <WG1699> hand. <WG5495>
If <WG1487> any man <WG5100> doesn't <WG3756> love <WG5368> the Lord <WG2962> Jesus <WG2424> Christ, <WG5547> let him be <WG2277> accursed. <WG331> Come, <WG3134> Lord!
The grace <WG5485> of the Lord <WG2962> Jesus <WG2424> Christ <WG5547> be with <WG3326> you. <WG5216>
My <WG3450> love <WG26> to <WG3326> all <WG3956> of you <WG5216> in <WG1722> Christ <WG5547> Jesus. <WG2424> Amen. <WG2881>
